Articles.Content:
I was experimenting with boats, and I came up with the Kassandra, a nice and speedy boat! With pleasing aesthetics and a cool ~5 hour burn time, this ship packs a punch! Just don't go too fast, as during testing at around 50m/s it capsized, and not the normal way, it flipped, front went way up and it just flipped. Daring test pilots Eileen and Ribvey were unscathed and were later recovered by the recovery crew in inflatable dinghies. I highly recommend Better Buoyancy because this boat was tested with that, and Hyperedit to put it in the water.

Eileen and Ribvey enjoying a cruise.

This was about 53m/s, stay below 45m/s for safety.

Don't forget your safety suits!

In the VAB

----------------

It can turn without even moving forward! All thanks to the airbreaks and the control surfaces!

Fun for all the family, order at your local shipyard.

Price: 81,240 Funds.

KerbalX Download.

©SAP-C Kassandra Boating Division.
Thank you! My second attempt at a boat, the first one capsized onto the runway island and broke apart, but Ribvey and Eileen were fine.
